protein.specific_function: Hydrolyzes specifically phosphatidic acid (PA) to produce lysophosphatidic acid (LPA)

reference.reference_text: Sonoda H, Aoki J, Hiramatsu T, Ishida M, Bandoh K, Nagai Y, Taguchi R, Inoue K, Arai H: A novel phosphatidic acid-selective phospholipase A1 that produces lysophosphatidic acid. J Biol Chem. 2002 Sep 13;277(37):34254-63. Epub 2002 Jun 12.
